name: CATIA V5 Part File
summary: Learn about .CATPART files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CATPART files can store part designs such as casings, metal brackets, machine parts, and other equipment pieces. They are often referred to as "CATPart" files in conversation.

description: A CATPART file is a 3D model created by CATIA V5, a 3D CAD manufacturing application. It contains a part model, including the three-dimensional geometry and structure data. CATPART files can be combined with other parts into a .CATPRODUCT assembly file.

instructions: You can open a CATPART file with Dassault Systemes CATIA (Windows, Linux), Autodesk Fusion 360 (multiplatform), or PTC Onshape (multiplatform).
